name: Pyro Park
description:
Pyro Park is a short real-time strategy game. Use firetrucks and helicopters to combat the flames. Build lookout towers to spot fires sooner. Replant devastated land. Watch wonder trees spring up around you.

Take a break from your day. The game can be beaten in as little as 10 minutes.  

Controls

WASD - move the camera

Left mouse - select

Right mouse - deselect 

Esc - pause game
